name: Obento Health
headline: CRM Co-Pilot for Medtech Sales
description: Obento Health is redefining the CRM experience for medical field sales. Designed specifically for healthcare, we are saving reps time from documentation and empowering reps to create more personalized interactions with their customers.
tags: industry:b2b; industry:medical-devices; industry:healthcare; industry:crm; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Naxin Wang, Founder
founders.description: I stumbled into healthcare and haven’t looked back since. Currently building CRM for Medical Sales at Obento Health. Analyst by training at Google and built products at Verily Life Sciences, serving biopharma and medtech customers.

generated_description:
**Obento Health** is a fresh face in the medtech landscape, founded in 2023 and already making waves as part of Y Combinator's Batch S23. Based in San Francisco and comprising a nimble team of just two, Obento is on a mission to redefine the CRM (Customer Relationship Management) experience specifically for medical sales reps. Their mantra? "CRM Co-Pilot for Medtech Sales."

This isn't just any CRM tool; Obento is designed to save sales reps time on tedious documentation, allowing them to focus on what really matters: building meaningful relationships with customers. By streamlining the logging of visits and managing customer interactions, Obento empowers sales reps to engage more personally with healthcare professionals.

### What They Offer

Obento stands out due to its focus on mobile usability—ideal for those constantly on the move. With its voice-to-CRM feature, reps can easily log notes by simply talking instead of typing, which means no more late-night catch-up sessions on documentation. It even auto-generates follow-up reminders based on these notes, ensuring that key connections never slip through the cracks.

The app is embedded with healthcare-specific data, making it far more effective than generic CRM tools. Obento integrates seamlessly with existing CRMs and productivity suites like HubSpot, Salesforce, and various calendar applications, enhancing user efficiency from day one.

### Features and Functionality

- **Voice to CRM:** Log visits quickly with voice notes that translate into structured data.
- **Follow-Up Reminders:** Automatic follow-up creation from notes ensures no missed connections.
- **Contact Management:** A user-friendly interface to access crucial contacts on-the-go.
- **Obento Assistant:** A hybrid of assistant and coach, guiding reps to optimize their interactions.

### Getting Started

The company encourages potential users to book a demo and take advantage of their early access program. No credit card is needed upfront, making it easy for territory managers to explore how Obento can revolutionize their workflow.

With backing from Garry Tan and a vision that positions it as not just a tool but a partner in driving sales success, Obento Health is poised to be a game-changer in the medical sales arena. For more information or to join the ranks of savvy sales reps using this innovative app, check out their website at [Obento Health](https://www.getobento.com).
